name: Caxy Gambá Encontra o Monstruário
description: Caxy Gambá Encontra o Monstruário (sometimes just referred to as Monstruário) is a Brazilian point-and-click adventure game produced by 44 Bico Largo, idealized by Ale McHaddo, with the participation of José Mojica Marins playing his classic horror film character Zé do Caixão and released in 2000. The game tells the story of Caxy Gambá, a marsupial who, during a stormy night, takes shelter in a mansion in the middle of nowhere.
